full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD MGON PO'I BLA RGYUD GSOL 'DEBS BYIN RLABS MYUR 'JUG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES DPAL MYUR MDZAD MGON PO'I BLA RGYUD GSOL 'DEBS BYIN RLABS MYUR 'JUG ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG NGA RGYAL RI KHROD CHEN MO'I DBU MDZAD MANG THOS SPONG BA PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES @004B BSKUL NGOR ^KHYAB BDAG GANGS RI'I MGON PO MCHOG GI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR LEN PA BTZUN PA SKAL BZANG RAB RGYAS KYIS CHOS 'KHOR RGYAL MI 'GYUR LHUN GYIS GRUB PA'I GNAS MCHOG LEGS BSHAD GLING DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
